title: P2G outputs
description: This document records the outputs of the P2G system

id.description: A unique identifier for each test

Capacity Factor.description: Calculate the capacity factor of components in the network

Capital Expenditure.description: Calculate the capital expenditure of components in the network

Curtailment.description: Calculate the reduction of energy production of components due to various factors, such as grid limitations.

Dispatch.description: Calculate which power plants should generate electricity at a given time.

Installed Capacity.description: Calculate the total potential power output of components.

Market Value.description: Calculate the monetary value of energy in the market.

Operational Expenditure.description: Calculate the operational expenditure in the network

Optimal Capacity.description: Calculate the optimal capacity of the network components

Revenue.description: Calculate the revenue of components in the network

Supply.description: Calculate the supply of components in the network

Withdrawal.description: Calculate the withdrawal of components in the network
